Week 4: Responsibility

Testimonial Tile 2: Success Stories and Responsibility
- Description: Videos featuring testimonials from successful patients, highlighting the importance of taking responsibility for their care and management of COPD.
- Benefit: Inspires patients to take an active role in managing their health and to learn from others' experiences.
Community Services Tile: Additional Support Options
- Description: An introduction to additional community services that can further support patients and families in managing COPD.
- Benefit: Expands patients' knowledge of available resources and encourages them to seek additional support when needed.
Assessment Tile 4: Future Commitments
- Description: Videos and questions asking patients and families about their willingness to continue their progress and commitment to COPD management.
- Benefit: Ensures patients are motivated and committed to maintaining their health improvements in the long term.
Discharge Education Improvement Tile: Feedback and Recommendations
- Description: A tile asking patients and families to share their thoughts on the care they received, including what they liked, what could be improved, and additional resources they would recommend.
- Benefit: Provides valuable insights for care teams to improve future care plans and incorporate patients' suggestions.
Coaching Call 4: Taking Control of Health
- Description: Care manager utilizes the coaching tool to show images of patients taking control of their health, inspiring and empowering the patient. The care manager then asks questions to support the patient in taking a more active role in managing their COPD.
- Benefit: Helps patients feel more confident and empowered to take responsibility for their care and health outcomes.
